rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A compact foyer leading to the central courtyard. The design integrates minimalistic aesthetics with subtle Vastu alignments ensuring a positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: An open-concept space adjacent to the central courtyard with floor-to-ceiling windows on one wall, maximizing natural light. Minimalist finishes and subtle Vastu considerations enhance comfort and luxury.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: A dedicated dining area that connects to the living space, featuring elegant fixtures and a clear view of the courtyard, aligning with minimalist design principles.

rooms.name: Kitchenette
rooms.description: Compact yet functional kitchenette integrated into the living area. Designed for efficiency, following modern minimalistic standards and incorporating Vastu guidelines.

openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling window ensuring ample natural light and a seamless view of the courtyard, following luxury design standards.
A minimalist door crafted with high-quality materials ensuring smooth transition between spaces.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom designed with minimalist decor and ample storage, incorporating Vastu principles for relaxation.

rooms.name: Bedroom
rooms.description: A secondary bedroom suitable for guest use, designed to be functional and aesthetically pleasing following minimalist design cues.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: A dedicated library space with built-in shelves, comfortable seating, and natural light from floor-to-ceiling windows. Vastu principles ensure a calm and focused atmosphere.

openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling window ensuring maximum natural light, aligned with luxury design and Vastu guidelines.
Seamless door designed for ease of movement between the master bedroom and library while adhering to minimalist standards.

central_courtyard.description: A central open courtyard providing natural light, ventilation and a connection to nature. The design respects local architectural styles and Vastu principles.
